outputs.output_descr: The overall objective the project is to provide technical support to the Counties across South Sudan with specific focus on strengthening policies formulation and guidelines to improved local governance; strengthen local government institutionally to perform mandated functions; and improve local government financing mechanisms for effective provision of basic services at the county level.
